title: René Marsiglia
text:
René Marsiglia (17 September 1959 – 25 September 2016) was a <a href="association%20football">football</a> defender and most recently the manager of <a href="N%C3%AEmes%20Olympique">Nîmes Olympique</a>. He was born in <a href="Aubagne">Aubagne</a>, France.
Marsiglia was named head coach of <a href="OGC%20Nice">OGC Nice</a> on 15 November 2011. Before that he was assistant coach at the club. He was sacked on 21 May 2012, despite having saved Nice from relegation that year.
On 26 June 2012, Marsiglia was named head coach of the <a href="UAE%20Pro-League">UAE</a> side <a href="Dubai%20Club">Dubai Club</a>.
On 26 December 2013, he became the new coach of <a href="N%C3%AEmes%20Olympique">Nîmes Olympique</a> in replacement of <a href="Victor%20Zvunka">Victor Zvunka</a>. He died on 25 September 2016, after a long illness.
